comment: Dr. Ford was a fantastic professor all around. She has real world experience and is able to translate that into her teaching very well. She actually cares about your future and shows it. If you actually go to class, pay attention, and do your work you will get a good grade in her class. Definitely take her if possible.

Great proffesor with real life experience in the field of marketing. The class was composed of 1 group groject, 2 presentations, 14, 1 page papers and 3 exams. She mentioned that she may decrease the work load. Overeall it was a great class and worth it.
She is very nice. She cares about the material and project, but she grades really easy. She also doesn't use lock down browser so that is a plus.

Easy class - 4 exams, 14 quizzes, 4 discussions, 3 creative deliverables, & group project. Need the textbook! The class is interesting & enjoyable. The group project isn't bad at all. One written plan & a presentation due at end of class. Professor gives good feedback but is a little slow with grading. A sweet & caring professor. Take her!

I took one of her online classes, and she was all right. The course itself was relatively easy; however, professor Ford does not grade or gives feedback in a reasonable time. I am still waiting for an assignment to be graded, and this was due back in October.

Really sweet professor. She wants everyone to get engaged in class, and she tries hard. Tests are hard, not gonna lie. One in-person test for me before COVOID started and then the rest online. Will work with you if need be.

Dr. Ford is seriously one of the best professors I have ever had at KSU. She has a lot of field experience and uses it to give real-world examples in lectures. She has a few tests and a group project that has been really enjoyable to do. If marketing is something that excites you, take her. She isn't a traditional professor but is way better!

She is a knowledgeable professor with a lot of experience in the field. She'll work with you to help you succeed and offers extra credit if you ask. You just have to take initiative. Also the group project is straight forward and easy.
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Group projects--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: she doesn't respond, group project is stupid.

She expects too much for an online class. A large percent of your grade is based off a group project, which involves sponsoring an actual sports team. It is very difficult to plan and coordinate. She is quiz heavy and uses lockdown browser with cameras. Quizzes are very difficult and you must study.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Graded by few things--Group projects
